channel.title: Remenence PK Team - 24/7 VPS
channel.description:
Almost Complete! just need a few people to get on and critique.
[u][b]Website[/b][/u] : [url=http://www.remenence-pk.tk/smf]http://www.remenencepk.tk/smf[/url]
Currently underway is Remenence PK. Remenence PK is going to be an all around server. Based on pking i'm hoping to center around edgeville and make into a massive PVP 1v1. [i]So come PK your heart out![/i]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/855/logofm.gif/][IMG]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/3157/logofm.gif[/img][/URL]
[u][b]Base:[/b][/u] Deltascape base.
[b][u]Features[/u][/b] Barrows 50 %, Pest Control, Bounty Hunter,God Wars and many more! Fight Pits, Assault! PK Box soon! Full Animated God Wars Bosses! Fully Animated Dark Beasts! KBD Slayer Many Skills working Nice Skilling Area [b]ON A VPS! so uptime 99.9-100%[/b] Good Source PKing, Did i mention PKING? (: Edgeville 1v1 , Mage Bank Pking, multi varrock! Friendly Staff Room For Expansion, and many updates to come. Webclient soon!
[u][b]What The Team Needs:[/b][/u] Client Developers Server Programmers Testers Website Coders, Managers (css, php, html ,xhtml, mysql)
[center][u][b]Pictures Below[/b][/u][/center]
[center][u][b]Shops[/b][/u][/center]
[center][img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/8448/0075.png[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Home[/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/9938/0068k.png[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Skilling Area[/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/821/0066.png[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]God Wars[/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://img848.imageshack.us/img848/3310/0076.png[/img][/center]
Contact - brendonpenwell@hotmail.com Website : [url=http://www.remenence-pk.tk/smf]http://www.remenencepk.tk/smf[/url] -Remenence PK ( Coming Soon )

Almost Complete! just need a few people to get on and critique.

Website : http://www.remenencepk.tk/smf

Currently underway is Remenence PK. Remenence PK is going to be an all around server. Based on pking i’m hoping to center around edgeville and make into a massive PVP 1v1.
So come PK your heart out!
